title: #107 Lohan Beach Recap #3 with Daniel Franzese (Mean Girls) + #RHONJ Recap

itunes:subtitle: Danny recaps MTV's Lohan Beach Club episode 3, and welcomes Lindsay's Mean Girls co-star Daniel Franzese to discuss the show, Dina on Celebrity Big Brother, and so much more. Danny also recaps this week's episode of The Real Housewives o...
description:
Danny recaps MTV's Lohan Beach Club episode 3, and welcomes Lindsay's Mean Girls co-star Daniel Franzese to discuss the show, Dina on Celebrity Big Brother, and so much more. Danny also recaps this week's episode of The Real Housewives of New Jersey where Teresa debuts her body on stage, and Marge and Jennifer fight about Jennifer's lip liner. Finally, Danny shares some wisdom he learned to deal with depressive episodes.


Lohan Beach Recap: 10:25

Daniel Franzese: 19:30ish

#RHONJ Recap: 37:02


*To support this pod & for bonus episodes, visit Patreon.com/EverythingIconic
